title: How do I deploy to Flash in Unity?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have a Unity Pro license, but I cannot find the Flash build option
  • I had a Flash add-on license attached to my Unity Pro 4 license, but when I upgraded to Unity 5, I cannot deploy to Flash any more

sections.title: Cause
content: Unity supported Flash in 4.x and earlier, but this is no longer the case with Unity 5.x

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity stopped supporting Flash in April 2013. It is not available to use in Unity 5.
If you already have a Pro license for Unity 4.x or below, which includes the Flash add-on, you will be able to create and build projects to Flash within those versions of Unity.

sections.title: More Information
content: See this blog for more information on support for Flash in Unity.
